derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from colon + Greek stoma 'mouth'

entry.def: A colostomy is a surgical operation in which a permanent opening from the colon is made.

means.word_mean: 1. a surgical operation that creates an opening from the colon to the surface of the body to function as an anus
